VII.i.2.E.7.d
.
Reestablishment of Eligibility as a Surviving Spouse
A remarried surviving spouse whose subsequent marriage is annulled or declared void can reestablish eligibility as a surviving spouse.
This applies to both pension and DIC recipients.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
